Description: Pottery ostracon (two fragments attached): on the recto (convex side) four lines of a list of goods given as payment by workman Amenemope to workman Merysekhmet. On the verso one line of illegible text.
Curator's comments: Attached to EA 1888,0512.408. In the register volume the provenance is given as Thebes, Karnak, but the latter is presumably place of purchase only.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136367) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136367)
